options.fileName:
=localEagle_demo_{{new Date().toLocaleString("en-US", { timeZone: "Asia/Kolkata", hour12: false }).replace(/(\d+)\/(\d+)\/(\d+), (\d+):(\d+).*/, (_, m, d, y, h, min) => (m.padStart(2,"0")+d.padStart(2,"0")+y+"_"+h.padStart(2,"0")+min.padStart(2,"0")))
}}

nodes.name: Convert to JSON
nodes.notes: Convert JSON to a file with current date and time in file name
